content:
PlantingSpace | REMOTE (Europe time) | Full-time | https://planting.space

We are an early-stage research and development startup. Our ambitious goal is to build a system capable of understanding knowledge, to answer questions and get things done. Our work leverages cutting-edge domains such as Probabilistic Programming and Applied Category Theory.

Skill areas:

  • Software engineering (Julia): to build our core system
  • Research across areas: to develop our theoretical framework

Useful experience: algorithms, Bayesian statistics, symbolic computing, optimization, category theory, information theory.

Find more on our website, and check out our job openings to apply: https://planting.space/joinus

You can also PM me!
